overview: Comprehensive test plan covering all aspects of user management system

testCoverage.securityTests: All security scenarios must be tested

testSuites.name: Authentication Service
testSuites.description: Tests for user registration, login, and authentication flows

testCases.name: User Registration - Valid Data
testCases.description: Register user with valid email, password, and name
steps: Call registration endpoint with valid data
Verify user record created in database
Verify password is hashed with Argon2id
testCases.expectedResult: User created successfully, verification email sent

testCases.name: User Registration - Invalid Email
testCases.description: Register user with invalid email format
steps: Call registration endpoint with invalid email

testCases.name: User Registration - Weak Password
testCases.description: Register user with password not meeting requirements
steps: Call registration endpoint with weak password
testCases.expectedResult: 400 Bad Request with password strength error

testCases.name: User Registration - Duplicate Email
testCases.description: Register user with already existing email
steps: Attempt to register second user with same email

testCases.name: User Login - Valid Credentials
testCases.description: Login with valid email and password
steps: Call login endpoint with valid credentials
Verify refresh token stored in database
testCases.expectedResult: 200 OK with access and refresh tokens

testCases.name: User Login - Invalid Password
testCases.description: Login with incorrect password
steps: Call login endpoint with wrong password

testCases.name: User Login - Account Lockout
testCases.description: Login with 5 failed attempts locks account
steps: Attempt login with wrong password 5 times

testCases.name: Email Verification - Valid Token
testCases.description: Verify email with valid verification token
steps: Verify account status changed to active

testCases.name: Email Verification - Expired Token
testCases.description: Verify email with expired verification token
steps: Wait for token to expire (24 hours)

testCases.name: Password Reset - Valid Request
testCases.description: Request password reset for existing user
steps: Call forgot password endpoint with registered email
Use token to set new password
testCases.expectedResult: Password reset successful, all sessions invalidated

testCases.name: Password Reset - Expired Token
testCases.description: Use expired password reset token
steps: Wait for token to expire (15 minutes)

testCases.name: Password Reset - One-Time Use
testCases.description: Verify reset token can only be used once
steps: Attempt to use same token again

testCases.name: Logout - Invalidate Refresh Token
testCases.description: Logout should invalidate refresh token

testCases.name: Logout - All Devices
testCases.description: Logout from all devices invalidates all sessions

testCases.name: Token Refresh - Valid Refresh Token
testCases.description: Refresh access token with valid refresh token
steps: Call refresh endpoint with valid refresh token
testCases.expectedResult: New tokens returned, old refresh token invalidated

testCases.name: Token Refresh - Invalid Refresh Token
testCases.description: Refresh with invalid or revoked refresh token
steps: Call refresh endpoint with invalid token

testCases.name: Remember Me - Extended Session
testCases.description: Remember me option creates 30-day session
steps: Verify refresh token expiry is 30 days
Verify access token expiry is 15 minutes

testCases.name: JWT Token Security
testCases.description: Verify JWT tokens are properly signed and validated
steps: Attempt to use tampered JWT token

testCases.name: Password Hashing Security
testCases.description: Verify passwords are properly hashed with Argon2id
steps: Verify salt is unique per user

testCases.name: Rate Limiting - Login Attempts
testCases.description: Rate limiting prevents brute force attacks
steps: Attempt multiple logins in short time
testCases.expectedResult: Rate limit exceeded error after threshold

testSuites.name: Authorization & Data Isolation
testSuites.description: Tests for role-based access control and data isolation

testCases.name: Data Isolation - User Cannot Access Others' Documents
testCases.description: Verify users cannot access documents belonging to other users
steps: Create two users (User A and User B)
User B attempts to access User A's document

testCases.name: Data Isolation - Database Query Filtering
testCases.description: Verify all database queries include user ID filtering
steps: Verify query returns only user's documents

testCases.name: Data Isolation - S3 Object Access
testCases.description: Verify S3 objects are organized by user and access controlled
steps: User A uploads document to S3
User B attempts to access User A's S3 object
Verify signed URLs work for owner only

testCases.name: Role-Based Access - Free User Limits
testCases.description: Verify free users have correct limits enforced
steps: Attempt to upload beyond monthly limit

testCases.name: Role-Based Access - Premium User Features
testCases.description: Verify premium users have access to advanced features

testCases.name: Role-Based Access - Enterprise Admin
testCases.description: Verify enterprise admins can manage organization users
testCases.expectedResult: Admin can manage users, actions logged

testCases.name: JWT Validation - Token Expiry
testCases.description: Verify expired JWT tokens are rejected
steps: Attempt API call with expired token

testCases.name: JWT Validation - Invalid Signature
testCases.description: Verify tokens with invalid signatures are rejected
steps: Create JWT token with tampered signature

testCases.name: Permission Checking - Middleware
testCases.description: Verify authorization middleware works correctly

testCases.name: Audit Logging - User Actions
testCases.description: Verify all user actions are logged
steps: Verify log contains user ID, action, timestamp
testCases.expectedResult: All actions logged with complete details

testSuites.name: User Profile Management
testSuites.description: Tests for user profile and account settings

testCases.name: View Profile - Authenticated User
testCases.description: Authenticated user can view their profile

testCases.name: Update Profile - Valid Changes
testCases.description: User can update profile fields

testCases.name: Update Profile - Email Change
testCases.description: Email change requires verification
steps: Verify old email still works until verified

testCases.name: Profile Picture Upload
testCases.description: User can upload and update profile picture

testCases.name: Password Change - Current Password Required
testCases.description: Password change requires current password
steps: Attempt password change without current password
Provide current password and new password
testCases.expectedResult: Password changed only with current password

testCases.name: Password Change - Session Invalidation
testCases.description: Password change invalidates all sessions
steps: Verify all other sessions logged out
testCases.expectedResult: All sessions terminated after password change

testCases.name: Active Sessions - View Sessions
testCases.description: User can view all active sessions
steps: Verify all sessions shown with details
testCases.expectedResult: List of all active sessions with device info

testCases.name: Active Sessions - Revoke Session
testCases.description: User can revoke specific session
steps: Verify that session no longer works

testCases.name: Active Sessions - Revoke Current Session
testCases.description: Revoke current session requires re-authentication

testCases.name: Account Deletion - Confirmation Required
testCases.description: Account deletion requires password and checkbox confirmation
testCases.expectedResult: Account marked for deletion with proper confirmation

testCases.name: Account Deletion - 30 Day Recovery
testCases.description: Account can be recovered within 30 days

testCases.name: Account Deletion - Permanent After 30 Days
testCases.description: Account permanently deleted after 30 days
steps: Verify account and data permanently deleted

testCases.name: Usage Dashboard - Metrics Display
testCases.description: Usage dashboard shows correct metrics

testCases.name: Usage Dashboard - Real-time Updates
testCases.description: Usage metrics update in real-time

testSuites.name: Social Login (OAuth)
testSuites.description: Tests for OAuth integration with Google, GitHub, Microsoft

testCases.name: Google OAuth - New User Registration
testCases.description: New user registers via Google OAuth
testCases.expectedResult: New account created with Google profile data

testCases.name: Google OAuth - Existing User Login
testCases.description: Existing user logs in via Google OAuth

testCases.name: GitHub OAuth - New User Registration
testCases.description: New user registers via GitHub OAuth
testCases.expectedResult: New account created with GitHub profile data

testCases.name: Microsoft OAuth - New User Registration
testCases.description: New user registers via Microsoft OAuth
testCases.expectedResult: New account created with Microsoft profile data

testCases.name: OAuth - Permission Denied
testCases.description: User denies permission during OAuth flow

testCases.name: OAuth - Account Linking
testCases.description: Link OAuth provider to existing account

testCases.name: OAuth - Duplicate Email Handling
testCases.description: OAuth email already exists in system

testCases.name: OAuth - Profile Sync
testCases.description: Profile data syncs from OAuth provider

testCases.name: OAuth - Token Validation
testCases.description: OAuth tokens are properly validated

testCases.name: OAuth - Unlink Provider
testCases.description: User can unlink OAuth provider
steps: Verify can still login with email/password

testCases.name: 2FA Setup - Generate QR Code
testCases.description: User can setup 2FA with QR code

testCases.name: 2FA Setup - Verify with Authenticator
testCases.description: Verify 2FA setup with authenticator app

testCases.name: 2FA Login - Valid Code
testCases.description: Login with valid 2FA code

testCases.name: 2FA Login - Invalid Code
testCases.description: Login with invalid 2FA code

testCases.name: 2FA Backup Codes - Generation
testCases.description: Backup codes generated during 2FA setup

testCases.name: 2FA Backup Codes - Use Backup Code
testCases.description: Login using backup code when 2FA unavailable
steps: Verify backup code marked as used

testCases.name: 2FA Backup Codes - One-Time Use
testCases.description: Backup codes can only be used once
steps: Attempt to use same backup code again

testCases.name: 2FA Enforcement - Enterprise Requirement
testCases.description: 2FA required for enterprise accounts

testCases.name: 2FA Disable - With Verification
testCases.description: Disable 2FA requires verification

testCases.name: 2FA Secret Security
testCases.description: 2FA secrets are encrypted and secure
steps: Verify secret not exposed in API responses

testSuites.name: Admin Panel
testSuites.description: Tests for enterprise admin user management

testCases.name: Admin Access - Enterprise Only
testCases.description: Only enterprise admins can access admin panel
steps: Login as free user, attempt admin access
Login as premium user, attempt admin access
Login as enterprise admin, verify access granted
testCases.expectedResult: Only enterprise admins can access admin panel

testCases.name: User Listing - Pagination
testCases.description: Admin can view paginated user list
testCases.expectedResult: User list with pagination and filtering

testCases.name: User Actions - Reset Password
testCases.description: Admin can reset user password
testCases.expectedResult: Password reset email sent to user

testCases.name: User Actions - Suspend Account
testCases.description: Admin can suspend user account

testCases.name: User Actions - Delete Account
testCases.description: Admin can delete user account
testCases.expectedResult: Account marked for deletion, user notified

testCases.name: Bulk Operations - Multiple Users
testCases.description: Admin can perform bulk operations on multiple users
testCases.expectedResult: Bulk operation successful on all selected users

testCases.name: Audit Logging - Admin Actions
testCases.description: All admin actions are logged
steps: Verify all actions logged with details
testCases.expectedResult: All admin actions logged with timestamp and admin ID

testCases.name: System Analytics - Dashboard
testCases.description: Admin can view system analytics dashboard

testCases.name: System Analytics - Reports
testCases.description: Admin can generate and view reports

testCases.name: Admin Security - Access Control
testCases.description: Verify admin actions require proper authorization
steps: Attempt admin action without proper role
Attempt admin action with valid role
testCases.expectedResult: Proper authorization enforced for admin actions

testCases.name: Data Export - Complete User Data
testCases.description: User can export all their personal data
steps: Verify export includes all data categories

testCases.name: Data Export - Standard Format
testCases.description: Data export in standard format (JSON/ZIP)
steps: Verify export format is JSON or ZIP

testCases.name: Data Export - Timely Delivery
testCases.description: Data export delivered within 24 hours
steps: Verify download link sent via email

testCases.name: Consent Management - Explicit Consent
testCases.description: User must give explicit consent for data processing

testCases.name: Consent Management - Withdraw Consent
testCases.description: User can withdraw consent at any time

testCases.name: Right to Deletion - Complete Data Removal
testCases.description: Account deletion removes all personal data

testCases.name: Data Minimization - Collect Only Necessary
testCases.description: System collects only necessary user data

testCases.name: Data Retention - Automatic Cleanup
testCases.description: Data retention policies enforced automatically

testCases.name: Audit Trail - Complete Logging
testCases.description: All user actions logged for compliance
steps: Verify all actions logged with details

testCases.name: Data Portability - Machine Readable
testCases.description: Data export in machine-readable format
steps: Verify format is JSON or similar
Verify data can be imported elsewhere

testCases.name: SQL Injection Prevention
testCases.description: Verify SQL injection attacks are prevented
steps: Attempt SQL injection in login form
Attempt SQL injection in search queries

testCases.name: XSS Prevention
testCases.description: Verify XSS attacks are prevented

testCases.name: CSRF Prevention
testCases.description: Verify CSRF attacks are prevented

testCases.name: Brute Force Protection
testCases.description: Verify brute force attacks are mitigated

testCases.name: Data Encryption at Rest
testCases.description: Verify sensitive data encrypted in database

testCases.name: Data Encryption in Transit
testCases.description: Verify TLS 1.3 for all communications
steps: Check TLS version in API calls

testCases.name: JWT Token Security
testCases.description: Verify JWT tokens are secure

testCases.name: Password Hashing Security
testCases.description: Verify Argon2id password hashing

testCases.name: Session Security
testCases.description: Verify session tokens are secure

testCases.name: Input Validation
testCases.description: Verify comprehensive input validation

testCases.name: S3 Bucket Security
testCases.description: Verify S3 buckets properly secured
steps: Verify signed URLs for user access

testCases.name: API Rate Limiting
testCases.description: Verify API rate limiting prevents abuse

testCases.name: Error Handling Security
testCases.description: Verify error messages don't leak sensitive info
testCases.expectedResult: Generic error messages, no sensitive info leaked

testCases.name: Dependency Security
testCases.description: Verify dependencies are secure and up to date

testCases.name: Environment Variable Security
testCases.description: Verify secrets properly managed
steps: Verify secrets not in version control
testCases.expectedResult: Secrets properly managed via environment variables

testCases.name: Login Performance
testCases.description: Login completes in under 500ms

testCases.name: Document Listing Performance
testCases.description: Document listing loads in under 200ms

testCases.name: Concurrent User Support
testCases.description: System supports 1000+ concurrent users

testCases.name: Document Upload Performance
testCases.description: Document upload completes within expected time

testCases.name: Analysis Completion Performance
testCases.description: Document analysis completes in under 2 minutes

testCases.name: API Throughput
testCases.description: System handles 1000+ requests per second

testCases.name: Database Query Performance
testCases.description: Database queries perform well under load
testCases.expectedResult: Database queries perform well under load

testCases.name: Caching Performance
testCases.description: Redis caching improves performance

testCases.name: Memory Usage
testCases.description: System memory usage within limits

testCases.name: CPU Usage
testCases.description: CPU usage within limits under load

testCases.name: Complete User Registration Flow
testCases.description: New user registers, verifies email, and logs in

testCases.name: Complete Document Upload and Analysis Flow
testCases.description: User uploads document and views analysis

testCases.name: Complete Password Reset Flow
testCases.description: User resets forgotten password
testCases.expectedResult: Password reset successful, can login with new password

testCases.name: Complete Profile Management Flow
testCases.description: User updates profile and settings

testCases.name: Complete Social Login Flow
testCases.description: User registers and logs in via OAuth

testCases.name: Complete 2FA Setup and Login Flow
testCases.description: User sets up 2FA and logs in with it

testCases.name: Complete Account Deletion Flow
testCases.description: User deletes account and data
testCases.expectedResult: Account marked for deletion, confirmation sent

testCases.name: Complete Admin User Management Flow
testCases.description: Admin manages users in organization
testCases.expectedResult: Admin successfully manages users, actions logged

testCases.name: Complete Data Export Flow
testCases.description: User requests and downloads data export
testCases.expectedResult: Data export generated and downloaded successfully

testCases.name: Complete Usage Dashboard Flow
testCases.description: User views and interacts with usage dashboard

testSchedule.securityTests: Run weekly and before production deployment
testSchedule.performanceTests: Run on staging before production deployment

testSuccessRate.actionOnFailure: Block deployment if critical tests fail
